tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My baby is not in a position for the scan , but she tried to interact with the baby ,tried multiple times with patience.
She clarified my doubts very  clearly .
She is very friendly and patient. She makes the patient comfortable and listen to patient concerns .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent radiologist recommended for pregnancy checkup and scan's, very friendly and helpful person.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor did not even let us look at the scan, even for the mother, doesnot even  explain as to how the baby growth is or has given any advice, she doesn’t respond to the questions asked by the patient

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: They gave me appointment at 9.40 and make me waited till 11.30,I lost my patience.Iam talking on behalf of all the patients not for my sake,we cannot sit for a long time unnecessarily.,and that scan doctor make me waited when it’s my turn she told to go rest room but when I have waited again she made me sit for ten more mins saying it will take you long time ,will call other patient for her it’s takes only two mins,how could she do that?first come first?and she was doing scanning to me she couldn’t control herself she became emotional and giving me some long explanation that creates negative vibration from her to me and for my baby .Scan doctors should have lot of patience  and they should be very polite and friendly that’s my advice to them.They should not be rude.we patients treat doctors as god becoz it’s in their hands..so we expect same from them......
Fine and friendliness can be improved else everything was good and expected detailed communication about the checkup but ended with no talk

Friendliness
Treatment with care
Proper guidance
Time management
Staff behaviour
Cleanliness
Concerned with patient well-being

Doctor greeted with a smile n then asked where do I stay n asked about my previous medication and then started he treatment. She was very polite n friendly n asked me not to be tensed instead she asked me to relax n told everything is fine.
Overall experience was good … the doctor was quite professional and  as the waiting hours are decreasing the experience is getting better .. Thq ..!!!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Great experience & very friendly doctors and all staff.
They properly co-operate in normal days in hospital or if in emergency we need any suggestions.

review: Dr rajani  her way of treating  me  was amazing   and  she was very polite  and the way of explaining  everything  was good and  the way she handled  was  very smooth  I would  definitely  recommend  this hospital  because  of their  polite attitude  and very patient  ....
The doc was in a hurry and she finished my scan but didn’t let me see the baby which I wait for during every scan. I was very dissatisfied
She explained clearly about body organs of the baby and was very patient enough. Liked her behaviour towards patient
Everything is good. I m satisfacted .... friendly nature  she responded very neatly .....I m very happy with her treatment .....
